title: Unlimited VPN Protection at $2.19/mo: See This Internet-Breaking PIA VPN Deal
description: If you want to take advantage of a USA-made VPN, the time has come. For the next few days, Private Internet Access is offering a discount on its 2-year subscription.
author: Gizmodo Deals
excerpt: Protect all devices at only $2.19/mo with Private Internet Access VPN. The deal is near its end, so grab your 82% off and save big.
text: Private Internet Access is one of people’s favorite VPNs. It’s cheap, lightweight, and offers a new realm of privacy and security. Best of all; the VPN offers unlimited protection for all devices and costs only $2.19 a month. The catch? It lasts for a brief period! See at Private Internet Access Protect All Devices With PIA VPN’s 82% Discount When we said unlimited protection, we weren’t joking. Private Internet Access can be used on as many devices as you want at the given price of $2.19 a month. This exclusive price is for the 2-year plan with 2 free months, discounted by a whopping 82%. PIA’s time-limited deal costs $56.94 for the initial 26 months, making it one of the most cost-effective VPNs of 2024. If you’re thinking about how to get it, simply use the button above to go to its site. Select the plan in the middle and follow the steps to subscribe. From this point, you’re the owner of one of the top VPN apps on the market. At $2.19 a month, you’ll surely have enough budget to handle it. Besides, using it in the long run is also great, as after the initial months expire, you’ll pay $56.94 annually, which isn’t a lot. We should remind you of its 30-day money-back guarantee that goes perfectly with this already perfectly juicy deal. Private Internet Access Discounts Don’t End Here As part of its heart-pounding discounts, PIA includes two more features: Antivirus Dedicated IP Both are heavily discounted, more so if you pick the aforementioned 2-year plan. You’ll enjoy its Antivirus for Windows at 68% off and only $1.45 a month! To be totally accurate, the price will be only $34.80 for the initial 26-month period, which is insanely LOW! Do you want a dedicated IP address from a VPN? No worries. It’s 50% off for the 2-year plan and will cost you a measly $2.50 a month or $60 for 2 years. Private Internet Access takes your budget seriously and doesn’t want you to spend a ton of money – rightfully so. At the price, you’re still getting a flagship VPN that can rival and sometimes beat more expensive picks. Let us remind you of PIA VPN’s huge server park of over 30,000 servers in 91 countries. The VPN is also quite fast thanks to its WireGuard implementation. Rest assured, PIA is suitable for streaming, torrenting, gaming, and exploring the dark web. All of this is coupled with obfuscation and Multi-hop connections, giving PIA a technological edge over many of its fierce competitors. Let’s stop talking and start appreciating. 82% off and only $2.19/mo is ridiculously good for a VPN of this caliber. It’s time to react and grab it while it lasts. We hope your reflexes are fast enough. See at Private Internet Access
html:
Private Internet Access is one of people’s favorite VPNs. It’s cheap, lightweight, and offers a new realm of privacy and security. Best of all; the VPN offers unlimited protection for all devices and costs only $2.19 a month. The catch? It lasts for a brief period!

See at Private Internet Access

Protect All Devices With PIA VPN’s 82% Discount

When we said unlimited protection, we weren’t joking. Private Internet Access can be used on as many devices as you want at the given price of $2.19 a month. This exclusive price is for the 2-year plan with 2 free months, discounted by a whopping 82%.

PIA’s time-limited deal costs $56.94 for the initial 26 months, making it one of the most cost-effective VPNs of 2024. If you’re thinking about how to get it, simply use the button above to go to its site. Select the plan in the middle and follow the steps to subscribe.

From this point, you’re the owner of one of the top VPN apps on the market. At $2.19 a month, you’ll surely have enough budget to handle it. Besides, using it in the long run is also great, as after the initial months expire, you’ll pay $56.94 annually, which isn’t a lot.

We should remind you of its 30-day money-back guarantee that goes perfectly with this already perfectly juicy deal.

Private Internet Access Discounts Don’t End Here

As part of its heart-pounding discounts, PIA includes two more features:

  • Antivirus
  • Dedicated IP

Both are heavily discounted, more so if you pick the aforementioned 2-year plan. You’ll enjoy its Antivirus for Windows at 68% off and only $1.45 a month! To be totally accurate, the price will be only $34.80 for the initial 26-month period, which is insanely LOW!

Do you want a dedicated IP address from a VPN? No worries. It’s 50% off for the 2-year plan and will cost you a measly $2.50 a month or $60 for 2 years. Private Internet Access takes your budget seriously and doesn’t want you to spend a ton of money – rightfully so.

At the price, you’re still getting a flagship VPN that can rival and sometimes beat more expensive picks. Let us remind you of PIA VPN’s huge server park of over 30,000 servers in 91 countries. The VPN is also quite fast thanks to its WireGuard implementation.

Rest assured, PIA is suitable for streaming, torrenting, gaming, and exploring the dark web. All of this is coupled with obfuscation and Multi-hop connections, giving PIA a technological edge over many of its fierce competitors. Let’s stop talking and start appreciating.

82% off and only $2.19/mo is ridiculously good for a VPN of this caliber. It’s time to react and grab it while it lasts. We hope your reflexes are fast enough.

See at Private Internet Access
